exam.question: The Car Club couldn’t ____ to meet the demands of all its members.

answer.explain: 句意：  汽车俱乐部不能保证满足其所有会员的要求。 assume：  假设； 臆断； ensure：  保证； 保护； confirm：  证实； 批准； 确认。

sentences.sContent: They offer a two-year guarantee on all their electrical goods.
sentences.sCn: 他们所有的电器产品都有两年的保修期。

sentences.sContent: ...They need to keep teams small and focused: giving in to pressure to be more “inclusive” is a guarantee of dysfunction...
...But to take the advantage of the airline’s guarantee fare policy...
...we should think highly of the importance of basic and fundamental skills that guarantee our wonderful and brilliant future...
...a college degree alone does not guarantee a good job for its holder...
...Learning to live without the guarantee of health is like having to unlearn a previous life...
...the opponents assume that they would not stake their money on such a risky investment which does not guarantee a promising career...

synos.tran: [金融]保证；[法]担保；保证人；保证书；[经]抵押品

phrases.pCn: 保证保险，盗窃意外保险
履行合同保证人；履约保证
担保有限公司；保证有限公司

remMethod.val: guar(看作guard， 保卫) ＋ antee → 保证； 保证书

words.tran: 担保（guarantee的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: a formal written promise to repair or replace a product if it breaks within a specific period of time
to promise that you will pay back money that someone else has borrowed, if they do not pay it back themselves
